text:
[Verse]
Walking down the lane
Hearts both feeling light
Dancing in the rain
Hold my hand tonight

[Verse 2]
Clouds above us cry
We laugh like it's a game
Kiss beneath the sky
Whispering your name

[Chorus]
Oh love in the rain
Feeling no pain
Together we remain
Oh love in the rain

[Verse 3]
Footsteps in the mud
Splashing every turn
In this fleeting flood
We let the passion burn

[Verse 4]
Raindrops on your skin
Dripping from your hair
Can't hold it all in
This love we both share

[Chorus]
Oh love in the rain
Feeling no pain
Together we remain
Oh love in the rain
title: Love in the Rain
